author: chilijung
name: tisa-map
description: This project is kicked off to defend the bill of Trade in Services Agreement between Taiwan and Mainland China from approval. Here we are listing cooperations influented, rolling slogans from folks, and exhibiting photos from ruins. If you are concerning these behaviors of selling Taiwan, start to commit today. We need you.
description_zh: 這個專案是為了兩岸服務貿易協定所開始的一個專案，目前這個網站會把所有會受到協定衝擊的公司列在這個 map 上，還有會讓一般民眾可以上傳抗議標語，然後把它羅列在這個 map 上面。
